summary: Extension to the ROS2 Gem that provides it with the RobotecGPULidar lidar implementation.
requirements: Requires a CUDA-capable GPU and installation of both the CUDA Toolkit 11.2+ and NVidia OptiX 7.2.
documentation_url: Link to any documentation of RobotecGPULidar goes here: i.e. https://o3de.org/docs/user-guide/gems/reference/design/white-box/
